title: College Fails
description: The pandemic is transforming college from a can't-miss into a can't-attend experience. Can colleges survive? | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: College Fails
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: With a month to go before the fall semester starts, universities are closing due to coronavirus, and also making hard cuts and tradeoffs around remote learning.
itunes:subtitle: With a month to go before the fall semester starts, universities are closing due to coronavirus, and also making hard cuts and tradeoffs around remote learning.
